project_abstract.cdata: The Third Irrigated Agriculture Intensification Project for China will increase water and agricultural productivity in low-and medium-yield farm land areas; to raise farmers' incomes and strengthen their competitive capacity; and to demonstrate and promote sustainable participatory rural water resources management and agro-ecological environmental management. The project consists of the following components: Component 1) improvement and construction of local irrigation and drainage systems at the tertiary and on-farm level; (b) implementation of engineering water-saving measures; (c) implementation of agronomic water-saving measures; (d) implementation of water-saving management measures; (e) preparation and implementation of groundwater management plans in water-short project counties in Hebei Province. Component 2): (a) strengthening and modernization of agricultural services and support systems; (b) high quality and specialized crops demonstration, extension and production; (c) development and support of farmers associations (FAs) including specialized farmer associations and establishment/demonstration of pilot farmers' professional cooperative organizations; and (d) applied technology and institutional training for farmers, agricultural technicians and farmers' professional organizations. Component 3): (a) establishment of shelterbelt forest networks around farmlands, including on-farm wind protection forests; (c) environmental monitoring and management; (d) training on environment and soil and water conservation; (e) demonstration and extension services on environment and ecology; and ( f ) preparation and execution of groundwater management plans in project watershort counties. Component 4) will finance institutional strengthening and support under the project and capacity building.

P084742.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>农业加强灌溉项目三期 </ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是：通过提高用水效率或农业生产率发展环境上可持续的现代灌溉农业，提高黄河、淮河和海河流域的农业产量并增加农民收入，同时帮助农民适应中国加入世贸组织后日趋激烈的市场竞争环境，并融入全球经济发展。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
